title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, November 15, 2020
description: It was on this day 80 years ago that 75,000 men were called to Armed Forces duty under the first peacetime conscription in American history.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day 80 years ago that 75,000 men were called to Armed Forces duty under the first peacetime conscription in American history.
